CategoryDescription: This category can include articles about research findings, faculty appointments and promotions, and other academic-related announcements.
This category can include articles about student activities, events, and initiatives, such as student clubs, organizations and sports.
This category can include articles about incidents and safety measures implemented on campus to ensure the safety of students and faculty.
This category can include articles about the achievements and accomplishments of former students and alumni, such as graduations, job promotions and career successes.
This category is typically a comprehensive and detailed report created as part of an academic or professional capstone project.
